item.description:
Fine, so she wants to continue to delay our flights... Well, Wednesday night is looking like one of those clear nights with a high pressure system. Let's take advantage and do our First Annual Sunday Night Spring Ahead Fly Out on a Wednesday! Works for me.
Please review your RSVP.... Wx will be coming here soon enough.

Anyone interested in going out on our

First Annual Spring Ahead Sunday Night fly out?

We turn the clocks back at 2:00 am. So we get the extra hour tonight. Let's use it.
Need a seat? Just ask! Rental? Easy night to find one. Need a co pilot? We have plenty.

We like Hartford's Wings.... Let's make it easy... Unless we all want somewhere else, let's go here. Food is good, entertainment is built in and the cost is reasonable!

I'm game!

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: First Annual Spring Ahead Sunday (WEDNESDAY) Night fly out
